document.full_text: customs officers have seized 1,932 karaoke machines bearing counterfeit logos, a u.s. customs and border protection spokesman said on thursday.
document.title: customs agents seize 1,932 karaoke machines in los angeles
lines_and_colors: customs officers have seized 1,932 karaoke machines bearing counterfeit logos, a u.s. customs and border protection spokesman said on thursday.
